text: Max Greenfield (born September 4, 1979) Part of a recap of Season 27, Episode 6 of Live! with Kelly and Michael, which aired September 8, 2014. is an American actor. He was known for his roles in Veronica Mars and Ugly Betty. He also played Schmidt in the Fox sitcom New Girl. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:Comedians from New York (state)
title: Max Greenfield
